Package pgui.win

Class ScrollWindow

java.lang.Object
pgui.type.Element
pgui.win.Window
pgui.win.ScrollWindow
public class ScrollWindow extends Window
A ScrollWindow is like a window, except that it's content can be scrolled through using a scroll bar, scroll buttons or the mouse scroll wheel.

  • Constructor Details

    • ScrollWindow

      public ScrollWindow(processing.core.PApplet applet, Palette cols, int x, int y, int w, int h, int contentH)
      Parameters:
      applet - A reference to the Processing sketch
      cols - The colour palette of the ScrollWindow
      x - The position of the ScrollWindow's canvas on the screen.
      y - The position of the ScrollWindow's canvas on the screen.
      w - Width of window
      h - Height of window
      contentH - The total content height - the vertical length of the scroll canvas.
